description: Access: Method Spryker\Shared\Collector\Code\Reader\KeyValue\RedisReader::__construct() accesses Spryker\Zed\Collector\Business\Storage\Adapter\KeyValue\ReadWriteInterface which violates rule "No call from Shared to Zed"

Factories: The method `Spryker\Zed\Collector\Business\CollectorBusinessFactory::createStorageExporter()()` contains a `foreach` statement which violates rule "Factory methods should not contain loops."

Factories: The method `Spryker\Zed\Collector\Business\CollectorBusinessFactory::createElasticsearchExporter()()` contains a `foreach` statement which violates rule "Factory methods should not contain loops."
Boolean methods do not use `get` prefix, use `is`/`has` instead or alike. Getter `Spryker\Zed\Collector\CollectorConfig::getEnablePrepareScopeKeyJoinFixFeatureFlag()` must not return bool.
Bridges: Method `getCurrentLocale()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer;` signature.
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `localeName` in method `Spryker\Zed\Collector\Dependency\Facade\CollectorToLocaleBridge::getLocale()`.
Bridges: Method `getLocale()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer;` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getCurrentLocale()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getLocale()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Bridges: Method `getCurrentStore()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer;` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getCurrentStore()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
